menu_home_desc:
See your design through your users' eyes
Reveal the hidden patterns of user engagement
menu_service_desc: Leverage advanced machine learning to simulate human eye-tracking instantly. Get 90% accurate results without expensive hardware or lab testing
menu_service_card_desc: Upload your design and visualize user attention in seconds. Identify focal points and blind spots to optimize your layout before launch
menu_tech_desc: Analyze your design deeper with our three core pillars of visual tracking
menu_tech_card0_desc: Instantly visualize the "hot spots" of your design. See exactly which elements capture immediate attention and which ones get ignored by users
menu_tech_card1_desc: Track the sequential order of user attention. Understand the narrative your design tells by following the numbered path of the user's eye
menu_tech_card2_desc: Get a quantifiable score on how clean and uncluttered your design is. Use data to remove distractions and focus on conversion goals
menu_tech_step0_desc: Select the UI mockup or webpage screenshot you want to analyze
menu_tech_step1_desc: Simply drag and drop your image (JPG, PNG) into the dashboard
menu_tech_step2_desc: Our predictive AI analyzes visual hierarchy and focal points instantly
menu_tech_step3_desc: Get your heatmap report and optimize your design for better conversion
